settings.title: WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE ORIGINAL AND THE MINI BOOK?
settings.content: The main difference is that The Everyday Mother Mini covers roughly three months (has 90 pages), and all of our other books cover roughly six months (180 pages). Additionally, The Everyday Mother has a hard cover, brass corners, and measures 8"x5"; The Everyday Mother Mini has a flexible poly cover, and measures 7"x5".

settings.title: ARE THE BOOKS DATED?
settings.content: No, the books are not dated, so you can use them whenever you'd like. Each page has a blank line for you to write the date on.

settings.title: CAN I USE IT IF I'M NOT BREASTFEEDING?
settings.content: YES. The Everyday Mother is designed to track all types of feeds: breast feeding, exclusive pumping, formula feeds, and a combination of methods. The purpose of The Everyday Motheri s to help YOU keep track in order to find what works for you and your family.

settings.title: How can I track for twins/multiples?
settings.content: We have a Twin Tracker notepad, designed specifically for twins. If you'd like to use the book for tracking, here is a post with a lot of great ways to use The Everyday Mother for twins and multiples.

settings.title: HOW LONG DOES SHIPPING TAKE?
settings.content: We currently pack orders on Mondays and Thursdays in our NY office. All orders ship using USPS, with the shipping method you selected at checkout. Shipping times vary depending on what method you chose, where you are located, and any known delays within the USPS (such as COVID related delays, delays due to natural disaster, etc.). Media Mail shipping, which is our Free Shipping option, can take up to 14 days without any delays. Priority Mail can take around 5 business days, without any delays. You can check the USPS site to see their current shipping times.

settings.title: HOW DO I ATTACH THE RIBBON?
settings.content: Here is a tutorial videof or attaching a ribbon to your book.

settings.title: HOW DO I INSERT ADD-ON PAGES?
settings.content: Here is a tutorial video for inserting add-on pages.

settings.title: WHICH ADD-ON PAGES FIT IN THE MINI?
settings.content: Milestone stickers, Doctor Visit Sticky Notes, and Big Moment Sticky Notes all fit in the mini.

settings.title: WHAT IS YOUR RETURN POLICY?
settings.content: We have a 30 day return policy. You can read our full Return & Exchange policy here.

settings.title: HOW LONG ARE LIMITED EDITION BOOKS AVAILABLE?
settings.content: Each year we offer a selection of Limited Edition Artist books, featuring designs that have won our yearly competition. Limited Edition books are available for one calendar year, or until they sell out. They are NOT restocked, and once they sell out, they can no longer be purchased.

settings.title: WHAT IF MY ORDER GETS LOST IN SHIPPING?
settings.content: If your order is delayed or lost, please first contact the USPS and file a missing item report. We cannot replace orders unless the USPS has deemed the item lost and made an official note of it associated with the tracking number.
